General.Name: Hota Industrial Mfg. Co Ltd
General.Description: Hota Industrial Mfg. Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells gear wheels, shafts and various transmission parts for automobile, motorbike, agricultural machinery, and tooling machinery in Taiwan, the United States, China, and internationally. It offers transmission products, including motor shaft, gearbox gear set, differential, and gear box components for electric car; transmission, engine, gearbox, and torque conversion system components for fuel car; satellite hydraulic and rocket engine parts for aerospace; engine, electric locomotive spare, and other spare parts for heavy machinery; and agricultural construction Machinery gearbox and rear axle products. The company provides gear hobbing, gear shaving, chamfering machines, pressing machine, and integration of automation system under the HARTECH brand name. The company was formerly known as Hota Industrial Development Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hota Industrial Mfg. Co., Ltd. in 1990. Hota Industrial Mfg. Co., Ltd. was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.

3.Name: Mr. Chang-Yuan  Chen
